```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
tcr_count <- tcr_info %>%
  group_by(aaSeq) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))
```

```{r}
tcr_count_5 <- tcr_count[tcr_count$count > 4,]
```
